p: in my bachelor thesis i looked into what web development should be like in 2013.
i researched a set of requirements to define what "state-of-the-art web development" actually means in the context of small to medium sized web agencies.
in order to make it possible to reach the ambitious goals set in the requirement analysis, i defined a set of processes, best practices as well as tools.
my writing of the thesis was supervised by my professor dipl.-inform. ilse schmiedecke.
